awd_titl_txt: International Travel:  CODATA Meeting on Phase Equilibrium  and Related Property Data; Paris, France; September 4-11,   1985
awd_abstract_narration: The Committee on Data for Science and Technology (CODATA) of the                International Council of Scientific Unions and the Commission on                Thermodynamics of the International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry         (IUPAC) is organizing a series of three International Conferences on            Phase Equilibrium and Related Property Data to be held in Paris,                France, September 4-11, 1985.  Partial travel support is provided for           4-6 participants from U.S. universities to attend these meetings.               Participation of top U.S. researchers is helping to maintain direct             knowledge of the future trends in experimental methods and measurements         of these critical physical properties.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
